roleset.name: remove as much of a malignant tumor as possible
roleset.note: DEBULK-V NOTES: Based on sentences in temprel 5 and stratified 1. No comparison. No VN or FN class. Framed by Katie. (from debulk.01-v)
DEBULKING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in temprel 5 and stratified 1. Comparison to debulk.01-v. No VN or FN class. Framed by Katie. (from debulking.01-n)

example.name: debulk-v: WIth arg 1 only
example.text: it-1 was debulked *-1 as much as possible and given IORT

example.name: debulking-n: literal mention of tumor as arg 1
